name: The Zwuggels - A Beach Holiday Adventure for Kids
description: Let your kid ( 4 years and older ) join the Zwuggels on an amazing trip in this interactive Summer adventure. Winner of PAEDI 2016 Award for outstanding children's software (Munich, Germany).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD3000 or higher with OpenGL 2.1 support Storage: 200 MB available space
